recipesJson.name: My Girlfriend's Melons
recipesJson.author: Hetch
recipesJson.description: My buddy asked me to make him a melon ball recipe. Wild Melon is still the star of the show. This is pretty straight forward but I will say this; I tried a couple other melons before deciding on the VT Shisha Melon.  It's at a ow enough percentage that I'm not getting any creamy notes but a nice full mouthfeel and nice Cantaloupe flavor. Straight forward juicy melon here, folks.
